metadata.title: CVE-2021-44759 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in TLS origin validation of Apache Traffic Server allows an attacker to create a man in the middle attack. This issue affects Apache Traffic Server 8.0.0 to 8.1.0.

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
